properties.description: creates the view needed for cost centre data for PBI

content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT  *
                FROM    sys.schemas
                WHERE   name = 'mipins' )
    EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [mipins]');
GO

--CREATE VIEW FOR COST CENTRE--

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW mipins.vw_mipins_hr_cost_centre
AS

SELECT DISTINCT

CostCenterID        AS Cost_Centre_Key,
CostCenterCode      AS [Cost Centre Code],
Description         AS [Cost Centre],
IsActive            AS IsActive,
IngestionDate       AS IngestionDate,
ValidTo             AS ValidTo

FROM [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].hr_costcenter_dim

GO
